Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpertGame
public class Game extends Observable implements Serializable
Class that contains all the components of the normal mode of the game and work with that Make that communicate and collaborate each other
See Also:
